acceptOwnership().details: Can only be called by the pending owner

returns._0: address The address of the current owner
address The address of the pending owner

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to
The address to transfer ownership to

acceptOwnership().notice: Transfers ownership to the pending owner.

owner().notice: Returns the current owner of the contract.

pendingOwner().notice: Returns the address of the pending owner of the contract.

proposeOwnership(address).notice: Proposes to transfer the contract's ownership to a new address. The new owner needs to accept the ownership explicitly.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address

documentation.text:
@notice Returns the current owner of the contract.
 @return address The address of the current owner

@notice Returns the address of the pending owner of the contract.
 @return address The address of the pending owner

@notice Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address
 @param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to

@notice Transfers ownership to the pending owner.
 @dev Can only be called by the pending owner
